document.full_text: japan on friday announced a plan to help tokyo electric power compensate victims of the crisis at its tsunami-crippled nuclear plant without going broke while it struggles to resolve the worst nuclear crisis since chernobyl.
document.title: japan approves tepco nuclear claims plan, reactor leaks
lines_and_colors: japan on friday announced a plan to help tokyo electric power compensate victims of the crisis at its tsunami-crippled nuclear plant without going broke while it struggles to resolve the worst nuclear crisis since chernobyl.
